==== Ubuntu Women ====

* It's official, 5% of Ubuntu Members are Women!
** Blog post by Elizabeth Krumbach: <nowiki>[[http://princessleia.com/journal/?p=3651]]</nowiki>
** Blog post by Jono Bacon: <nowiki>[[http://www.jonobacon.org/2010/11/02/over-5-of-ubuntu-members-are-women-rock-and-roll/]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://fullcirclemagazine.org/issue-43/|Full Circle Magazine, Issue #43]]</nowiki> article "5% of Ubuntu Members are Women" by Elizabeth Krumbach
* Of the 623 Ubuntu Members at the end of this month 5.14% are women (30 November 2010)
